title: Service-Learning-Based Social Problem-Solving Simulation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic awareness of social issues and experience with project-based learning
context.additional_context: Hybrid service-learning design combining VR environments with real-world community-linked projects.

learning_goals: Explain the service-learning project design process for solving community problems with over 80% accuracy.
Improve collaborative decision-making skills by over 1 point (on a 5-point scale) in uncertain problem situations using VR simulations.
Create a portfolio expressing social responsibility through service-learning activities linked with real-world social institutions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
